thread.title: Norwegian Hosting a Star Trek Cruise
thread.title_full: Norwegian Hosting a Star Trek Cruise

title: Norwegian Hosting a Star Trek Cruise
text:
Norwegian Hosting a Star Trek Cruise August 13, 2015 
Travel agents with Trekkies as clients take note: Norwegian Cruise Line is offering what it says is the first officially licensed Star Trek cruise, complete with Captain Kirk himself, William Shatner. The six-day cruise sails out of Miami on Jan. 9, 2017 and visits Cozumel, the Great Stirrup Cay and Nassau before returning. Besides appearances by Captain Kirk, the cruise includes a masquerade ball hosted by John de Lancie who played Q in the television series, a Festival of the Moon Party, a concert by the Enterprise Blues Band, and Star Trek themed bars. Rates start at $975 for an inside cabin. For more information and to book, visit the cruiseâ€™s website . 0
